title: Box, 1920–40
markings: On bottom of box, a raised "631".  Also, in black, a triangle containing a horizontal line with a rising perpendicaular arrow surmounting "Dek. 257".
description: Oval lid and body.  Slightly convex lid surmounted by a backward s-shaped vertical handle about nine centimeters long. Oval body narrowing at bottom with curving and descending ramp-like handles on either narrow side.  Both pieces glazed turquoise with highlights of airbrushed brown.  Abstract surface decoration, in the center on the long side of the box, of lines, waves, and patches in airbrished royal blue, brown, and rust.

tombstone.epitaph:
Box, 1920–40.
1920–40. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Victor Wiener. 1996-18-14-a,b.
